trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Peru
There were no other sightings in Peru on or around April 4th 2006
Summary: flash of light from silver object, no movement then disappeared. not a plane
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving s. on US31 from Peru, approaching Grissom AFB. Initially thought the flash was from airplane, but it hovered then disappeared. I kept looking for airplanes or jet trails. None visible. the sky was clear and only had small puffs of cloud. It was a very small glint of light. Like a reflection off of a mirror that momentarily turned my way. I don't know what it was, but I couldn't find a plane in the sky.
